ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Research components
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/7/99 11:02:06 AM Eastern Daylight Time, spyke@verant.com ... Some people say you must also be standing near each other. It is also polite
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/7/99 11:02:06 AM Eastern Daylight Time, spyke@...
writes:

> Translation on the dark elf word: "spam"
> --to group with someone to form a party.
>
> Very important in learning other languages. You must be grouped with the
> person that is speaking the language you want to know. =)
>

Some people say you must also be standing near each other.

It is also polite to do it in gsay so that you do not disturb others with
your gibberish (because that is what it will be at the beginning)

And also be carefull. If you speak too fast ... some people will be forced
to leave the world (I.E. they will be punted) it will take practice to find
a pace that is fast... while also not too fast. And it depends on each
person. The person I normally play with can take text as fast as I can send
it. While I will punt if it is given to me more than 10 lines a second.

Sonorous
